Package uk.co.zodiac2000.subscriptionmanager.api

Class SubscriberController

java.lang.Object
uk.co.zodiac2000.subscriptionmanager.api.SubscriberController
@RestController @RequestMapping(path="/subscriber", produces="application/json") public class SubscriberController extends Object
REST API for accessing the subscriber aggregate.

  • Method Details

    • getSubscriber

      @GetMapping(path="/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SubscriberResponseDto> getSubscriber(@PathVariable("id") long id)
      Returns the Subscriber identified by id.
      Parameters:
      id - the subscriber id
      Returns:
      the subscriber

    • createSubscriber

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SubscriberResponseDto> createSubscriber(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid NewSubscriberCommandDto commandDto)
      Creates a new Subscriber aggregate root and persists it. Returns a response document representing the new subscriber.
      Parameters:
      commandDto - command DTO representing the new subscriber
      Returns:
      a SubscriberResponseDto

    • deleteSubscriber

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") @ResponseStatus(code=NO_CONTENT) public void deleteSubscriber(@PathVariable("id") long id)
      Deletes the subscriber identified by id.
      Parameters:
      id - the subscriber identifier

    • updateSubscriberName

      @PutMapping("/{id}/subscriber-name") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SubscriberResponseDto> updateSubscriberName(@PathVariable("id") long id, @RequestBody SubscriberNameCommandDto commandDto, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult errors) throws org.springframework.validation.BindException
      Updates the subscriber name of the subscriber identified by id. If the subscriber doesn't exist then Not Found is returned and no change is made to the state of the system.
      Parameters:
      id - the subscriber id
      commandDto - the new subscriber name
      errors - data binding and validation errors
      Returns:
      the modified subscriber
      Throws:
      org.springframework.validation.BindException - if a validation failure occurs

    • setSamlIdentifiers

      @PutMapping("/{id}/saml-identifiers") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SubscriberResponseDto> setSamlIdentifiers(@PathVariable("id") long id, @RequestBody @Valid @Valid SamlIdentifiersCommandDto commandDto)
      Replaces the set of SAML identifiers associated with the subscriber identified by id with the SAML identifiers specified by commandDto.
      Parameters:
      id - the subscriber identifier
      commandDto - an SamlIdentifiersCommandDto containing a list of SamlIdentifierCommandDto objects
      Returns:
      the modified subscriber

    • setOidcIdentifiers

      @PutMapping("/{id}/oidc-identifiers") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SubscriberResponseDto> setOidcIdentifiers(@PathVariable("id") long id, @RequestBody @Valid @Valid OidcIdentifiersCommandDto commandDto)
      Replaces the set of OIDC identifiers associated with the subscriber identified by id with the OIDC identifiers specified by commandDto.
      Parameters:
      id - the subscriber identifier
      commandDto - an OidcIdentifiersCommandDto containing a list of OidcIdentifierCommandDto objects
      Returns:
      the modified subscriber
